answers.answer: Hello!Stop taking any kind of medications or supplements without prescription.Do not smoke or consume alcohol and adopt healthy dietary habits.Eat lot of fresh fruits, vegetables and proper portions of carbohydrates, proteins and fat in your regular diet.Change into a good natural organic soap and avoid synthetic chemicals in your soap, shampoo and creams/moisturizers.If your symptoms continue then follow up for some blood work and diagnosis of any skin issues.Take care!

question: I have had sweet, almost nutty smelling skin for the past 3 weeks. I have recently started running again and am thinking that it is probably ketones. Is it unusual or unhealthy for ketones to emit as odor from the body? I have no other sxs related to diabetes.
title: Sweet-smelling skin/non-diabetic
